gun.name: Thompson M1921
gun.description: A submachine gun, abbreviated SMG, is a magazine-fed, automatic carbine designed to shoot handgun cartridges. The term "submachine gun" was coined by John T. Thompson, the inventor of the Thompson submachine gun

gun.name: Bazooka3000x
gun.description: Bazooka (/bəˈzuːkə/)[8] is the common name for a man-portable recoilless anti-tank rocket launcher weapon, widely deployed by the United States Army

Pistols.name: 2mm Kolibri
Pistols.description: The 2mm Kolibri (also known as the 2.7mm Kolibri Car Pistol or 2.7×9mm Kolibri) was the smallest commercially available centerfire cartridge,[2] patented in 1910 and introduced in 1914 by Franz Pfannl, an Austrian watchmaker, with financial support from Georg Grabner.

Grenades.name: Grenade
Grenades.description: A grenade is an explosive weapon typically thrown by hand, but can also refer to projectiles shot out of grenade launchers
